name: Haunted Dungeons (LordDiego)
description:
Submission for the Brackey's Gamejam 2023.1
Player enters the dungeon crowded with monsters.

When player is killed, he respawn at town, where he can spend all the looted gold in upgrades from the Blacksmith or the Shop and then go back to the dungeon.

But (there's always a But...) each time the hero goes back, the dungeon randomly regenerates

Made in Unity. Assets made in Blender for the jam, except the skeletons (made for the BGJ 2021.1) and the Ghost (made for Sketchfab's 3December2020 challenge)

I'm very happy with the submission. Learn lots of new things on the way.

Run out of time for the WEBGL version (which took foorrreeeverrr to compile)

Sorry for the lack of graphics on the town. Impossible to make all assets and the game in one week, working on other game project (near the deadline)
